Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the SELVE Home Skill you can easily operate your smart home devices (such as roller shutter) that you taught in the SELVE Home Server 2 with your voice.

Requirements:
- SELVE Home Server 2
- Activated SELVE Cloud Account

In order to use the SELVE Home Skill, the SELVE Cloud Account will be linked to Amazon and data will be transferred from the SELVE Cloud to Amazon (data will be saved at Amazon).

With your voice you can control individual devices, groups or scenes.

Shadowing:
• "Alexa, set living room roller shutter to 32 percent" (Selve commeo radio)
• "Alexa, set living room roller shutter to 0 percent" (Selve commeo radio, roller shutter completely opened)
• "Alexa, set living room roller shutter to 100 percent" (Selve commeo radio, roller shutter completely closed)
• "Alexa, decrease living room roller shutter" (roller shutter moves down)
• "Alexa, increase living room roller shutter" (roller shutter moves up)

Light:
• "Alexa, turn on living room light"
• "Alexa, turn off living room light"
• "Alexa, set living room light to 42 percent" (dimming actuator Homematic IP)

Heating:
• "Alexa, set living room heating to 23 degrees" (heating controller Homematic IP)

Scene:
• "Alexa, turn on watch TV"

Please note that it can also lead to voice control of other persons since the system can not distinguish between voices. Therefore, do not use the system with safety critical devices.
In order to use the Skill, activate it and enter your login data for the SELVE Home Cloud. Afterwards you have to take over the smart devices in the section “Smart Home” under “devices” and “scenes”.
In case of any questions or comments, please send us an email to service@selve.de
SELVE wishes you a lot of fun controlling your SELVE Home Server system.
